review:
very nice film. the handling is superb. the technology touch given is very high class considering those times (2002). great work by manishankar and all team.

danny, milind soman, gg and all others have done their best.

dil mera ek tara is a beautiful song.

background score is up to the level of perfection.

in my view, this is really a master piece.

it's quite good movie all time. all the characters played a vital role in their side. whenever i watched the movie i never get bored, i am much impressed by the acting of dost khan(gulshan grover) as well victor.. that's all..
